mail.subject: RDO Unhandled Error Notification
mail.info: Email yang terkim kepada developer ketika terjadi error code 1
mail.content:
Fatal error occured with the following detail :

  • Application : {app}
  • WS Method : {ws}
  • File : {file}
  • ErrCodeStr : {errCodeStr}
  • Desc : {errString}
